Package javelin.model.unit.feat

Class MartialTraining

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.unit.feat.Feat
      • javelin.model.unit.feat.MartialTraining
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Cloneable
    public class MartialTraining
extends Feat
    TODO how to allow player to select the maneuvers to learn? Javelin allows you to take as many feats as you want right up the bat so we need to add some validation here for when the assumption you'll only get a feat every x levels is false. However we don't want to limit this too much as we have this count for 2 feats with each buy.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
